entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 17.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this morning. High minus 17. Wind chill minus 36 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 32 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
